data.title: Petition · Make a third season of Xavier: Renegade Angel
data.meta_description:
Xavier: Renegade Angel was the most radical and most intellectually important Adult Swim show.  We demand that Xavier Renegade Angel receive a third and maybe fourth season!  His adventures into the realm of the MIND and his endless queries into the meaning of LIFE must go on!
We would like to see:

More Chomsky-Honks
More Shakashuri Visions
Further examinations of the important philosophical quer
data.text:
Xavier: Renegade Angel was the most radical and most intellectually important Adult Swim show. We demand that Xavier Renegade Angel receive a third and maybe fourth season! His adventures into the realm of the MIND and his endless queries into the meaning of LIFE must go on!

We would like to see:

More Chomsky-Honks

More Shakashuri Visions

Further examinations of the important philosophical queries of our day

MORE XAVIER

So we petition you, Adult Swim & PFFR, please make our dreams come true!
